We're delighted to welcome [Dongwook Kim](../../people/grad-students/dongwook-kim.qmd) to the lab!
Dongwook joins us Burin Co., Ltd. in Seoul, where he was working as a research engineer.
Prior that that, he earned a BS and MS at Hanyang University.
Dongwook's interests include water resources, flood risk, tropical cyclones, and infrastructure risk assessment.
